model.name: Monogram Jacquard Bomber Jacket
model.disambiguatingDescription: A sporty bomber jacket revisited with an iconic signature. In a staple gender-fluid cut, the body is crafted from unlined wool, while the sleeves strike a contrast in washed silk. A leather trim on the double piped pockets adds a refined touch and a Monogram canvas tab on the cuff completes the Louis Vuitton look.

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
• Main Material : 53% Wool,36% Cotton, 9% Silk, 2% Cashmere
  • Other Material : Polyvinylchloride
  • Lining : 100% Cotton
  • Brown
  • Regular fit
  • Model wears size 36
  • Model measurements : Bust 30,5" / 76cm, Height 5'9" / 175 cm, Waist 24,5" / 58cm, Hips 34,5" / 85cm
  • Made in Italy
  • Do not wash
  • Do not bleach
  • Do not tumble dry
  • Iron at a maximum sole-plate temperature of 110°C
  • Mild professionnal dry cleaning in hydrocarbons
